name: Sam Shi

projects.title: Kashflows
projects.description: React, React Router, Django REST, recursive API method. Deployed to Vercel.
imageDesc: Kash-flows allows you to visualize the flow of Ethereum tokens from one wallet to another, using a recursive API call to query the blockchain. Technologies used: ReactJS, Django REST. Heroku/Vercel, ReactFlow, D3
Data is then passed to the React frontend via a Django REST API, and a graph of transactions and wallets is displayed on the page using ReactFlow and D3.
Users may input a timeframe to search transactions as an option, however they are required to input a wallet address to search from.
I posted this website on Reddit for feedback, and boy did we do just that! As of 8/3/2022, my post is sitting at 8.7k views!

projects.title: Crypto Threads
projects.description: jQuery/AJAX, ChartJS, Pandas, Django, Postgres, Deployed to Digital Ocean
imageDesc: Crypto Threads aggregates Reddit comments and Tweets for multiple cryptocurrencies for a specific date, allowing users to get a sense of market sentiment among top social media posts. Users may select a date on the graph and view top posts for that date. Technologies used: jQuery, AJAX, ChartJS, Pandas, Django, Postgres, Digital Ocean

Users may select a smaller timeframe to view the graph in. Reddit and Twitter data is stored in a Postgres Database via an API script, and is automatically updated daily. Database now contains ~52,000 comments from ~4,400 threads.
Toggling between social media platforms and changing what asset class to view:
Highest upvoted Reddit Comment among multiple subreddits displayed for a date:
A Twitter bot takes the top Reddit comment and posts it to reddit along with the subreddit and no. upvotes. The bot is currently inactive, but can be found here: https://twitter.com/TopCryptoReddit
